name: Hell Bullet
description:
Controls

WASD or Arrow Keys to move.
SPACE to dash.

Description

My First Game.
Fight as a bullet in hell, you are your weapon.
Outmanuever enemy bullets and keep track of your ammunition.

Bullet Hell Jam 2021 - "10 SECONDS"

Content
  • 3 Bosses
  • 3 Types of enemies
  • 3 Enemie variantions
  • 10 Stages + Tutorial

Music by Cyberleaf Studio:

https://assetstore.unity.com/publish:ers/963
